name: Cupid teacher
description:
In this game, your goal is to discover which students are in love with each other and, after that, put them in the same class group. You will need to observe which student talks a lot with which student, which ones are always looking at each other...

Write notes with your chalk to make sure you don't miss or forget any detail.

Make them happy!

Made for GMTK game jam 2021.
